revised_title: Researches on the Structure, Organisation, and Classification of Fossil Reptilia: Part IX, Section 1 - On the Therosuchia
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of the fossil reptilia, specifically focusing on the Therosuchia. The study investigates the dental anatomy and palate structure of various reptile genera, including Galesaurus, Lycosaurus, and Nythosaurus, to better understand the relationships and characteristics of this diverse group of animals.
